mapper.insert: INSERT INTO image_file( member_id, file_register_table_no, file_register_table_name, image_file_path, image_file_real_name, image_file_stored_Name, image_file_ext, image_file_type, image_file_size, image_file_register_date ) VALUES( #{memberId}, #{fileRegisterTableNo}, #{fileRegisterTableName}, #{imageFilePath}, #{imageFileRealName}, #{imageFileStoredName}, #{imageFileExt}, #{imageFileType}, #{imageFileSize}, now() )
